title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 83-2.15 - Effect of consultation or recommendations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 83-2.15 - Effect of consultation or recommendations

State Regulations

The response and recommendations of the Attorney General, the mental hygiene agencies as appropriate, and the public health and health planning council, when sought or required pursuant to any provision of this Subpart, shall be considered by the department; provided however that such recommendations or the result of such consultation shall not be binding on the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
83-2.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
